name: Scaredy Squirrel: Fear of Flying
description:
HELP SCAREDY SQUIRREL BEAT HIS FEAR OF FLYING

Strap on a nutty jetpack and help guide Scaredy Squirrel through dangerous skylines. Dodge and elude a storm of enemies as you collect coins to unlock new costumes and crazy powerups! Can you fly carefully enough to avoid crashing and defeat Scaredy's enemies? Hurry up - every second counts!

Highlights:

• Jetpacks Galore - Fly through the air in over 10 crazy jetpacks, from Bubble Trouble to the Cheese Squeezer!

• Collectibles, Challenges, and Achievements - Collect over 40 items to master the skies and unlock new achievements!

• Boss Battles - Fight through UFOs, angry birds, and rings of fire to defeat Scaredy's biggest rivals!

• Amazing Power-Ups - Rip a hole through space or slow down time to become the ultimate furry flyer!

----------------------------

Scaredy Squirrel: Fear of Flying may contain in-app advertising.

For more information regarding Nelvana Digital’s use of user data, please visit the Nelvana Digital Privacy Policy. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Apple, Inc., and Nelvana Digital and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Apple's collection or use of your personal user data and information.
